mapper.select: SELECT de.user_id, de.address, de.address_title, de.create_time as sign_date, group_concat(img.url) AS imgs FROM sign_detail de LEFT JOIN sign_detail_img img ON img.sign_detail_id = de.id where de.is_delete = 0 and de.user_id = #{userId} and de.create_time >= #{startDate} and de.create_time < #{endDate} GROUP BY de.user_id, de.address, de.address_title, de.create_time

SELECT de.user_id, FROM_UNIXTIME(de.create_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') as sign_date, count(1) as sign_count FROM sign_detail de where de.user_id in (${userIds}) and de.create_time >= #{startDate} and de.create_time < #{endDate} group by de.user_id, sign_date

SELECT de.user_id, de.address, de.address_title, FROM_UNIXTIME(de.create_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d') as signTime, de.create_time, de.lng, de.lat, de.remark, group_concat(img.url) AS imgUrls FROM sign_detail de LEFT JOIN sign_detail_img img ON img.sign_detail_id = de.id WHERE de.is_delete = 0 and de.user_id in (${userIds}) AND de.create_time >= #{startDate} AND de.create_time < #{endDate} GROUP BY de.user_id, de.address, de.address_title, de.create_time, de.lng, de.lat, de.remark
